channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Over 100,000 attend London rally organized by far-right activist, clashes break out

item.title: 9/13: Saturday Morning
item.description: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect held without bail; Comedian Riki Lindhome opens up about her life and career.

item.title: 'We knew the family': Utah town in disbelief after local resident accused of killing Charlie Kirk
item.description: Tyler Robinson is accused of killing Charlie Kirk during an open-air speaking event.

item.title: Netanyahu is only obstacle to bringing hostages home, families say
item.description: Israel's strike on Qatar shows that "every time a deal approaches, Netanyahu sabotages it", the group says.

item.title: Huge fire rips through residential homes in Manila
item.description: Local reports say at least 14 fire trucks were called to the fire in the residential area, resulting in an evacuation to two nearby centres.

item.title: Malawi - where the petrol queue might overshadow the queue to vote
item.description: With long petrol queues on city roads, everyday issues dominate in the run-up to Tuesday's vote.

item.title: Charlie Kirk memorial service set to take place in Arizona stadium

item.title: They witnessed Charlie Kirk’s assassination. Now students reckon with the trauma
